attributes.action: adding more professional people into schools to help students mental health
attributes.additional_details: The percentage of students suffering with their mental health increases every year and more and more students are saying that they don't know what they could do to help themselves and learn ways to cope with what they are suffering with.
attributes.background: Add more professional people trained for helping people with their mental health so as generations go up and the increase of students suffering with their mental health could hopefully start to decrease if there are more people in school students could talk to and learn ways to help themselves

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Provide funding for mental wellbeing staff for children in schools and college: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628202

Require all secondary schools and colleges to have a full-time counsellor: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630482
